backend/main.mo: Implements feedback submission, storage, admin-restricted retrieval, and optional Discord webhook posting with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op migration that returns the previous state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking feedback form features to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files, their responsibilities, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light/dark modes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with multiple routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Renders a feedback form with Discord username support, success/error handling, and mutation-based submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the global layout with navigation, routed content, Discord CTA, and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Discor: Displays a Discord CTA card with support email and a join button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQSec: Renders FAQ items using an accordion with marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Displays a grid of circular feature cards using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FinalC: Renders a final call‑to‑action section with headline, subheadline, and two CTA buttons using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Displays footer with branding, product and company links, social icons, and dynamic year handling using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Creates the hero banner with headline, subheadline, and primary CTA button animated into view.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Motion: Wraps content with an intersection‑observer fade/slide‑in animation, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Shows pricing plans with features, images, and CTA buttons, highlighting recommended plans and animating items in.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Provides a styled section wrapper with padding, container layout, and optional id.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Displays testimonials with quotes and authors in an animated grid layout using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TopNav: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with scroll effects, links, CTA button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Defines static marketing content, including navigation items, hero text, features, testimonials, and pricing data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Re-exports the feedback submission mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitFeedbackMuta: Defines a mutation for submitting feedback through the backend actor with basic validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and theme variables plus styling for light/dark modes and custom components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, story sections, and FAQ.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Assembles the main home page sections including hero, features, social proof, and feedback form.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Builds the marketing landing page with navigation, hero, features, pricing, FAQ, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/MorePage.tsx: Placeholder page indicating more content coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentMethodPage.tsx: Displays payment method options, conditions, and security info using marketing content.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Shows the pricing section with a Buy Now link.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewPage.tsx: Shows the social proof section as a standalone review page.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering styled Terms of Service sections with animated components and icon headers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, shadows, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s state, existing features, and pending feature requests related to feedback and Discord integration.
